about_the_game:
In a certain tower, on a certain coast, the source of the world’s sun is born every day in an endless cycle. Every night, the source of the world’s sun dies. This source is “Gooey” a small fire slime that gains radiance as it gathers the flame coins on its journey up the Tower. Become “Gooey”, ascend the Tower, and become the sun, so the world’s daily cycle can continue!

Find and gather as many flame coins as you ascend the tower! The more coins you gather, the more radiant a sun you become! Watch your step as you ascend, though, otherwise you’ll be set back to try again.



  • Localization: English, Spanish, German, Korean, Japanese, Russian
  • Dynamic Lighting and Shadows
  • Dynamic Audio Tracks
  • Multiple Endings



This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.
detailed_description:
In a certain tower, on a certain coast, the source of the world’s sun is born every day in an endless cycle. Every night, the source of the world’s sun dies. This source is “Gooey” a small fire slime that gains radiance as it gathers the flame coins on its journey up the Tower. Become “Gooey”, ascend the Tower, and become the sun, so the world’s daily cycle can continue!

Find and gather as many flame coins as you ascend the tower! The more coins you gather, the more radiant a sun you become! Watch your step as you ascend, though, otherwise you’ll be set back to try again.



  • Localization: English, Spanish, German, Korean, Japanese, Russian
  • Dynamic Lighting and Shadows
  • Dynamic Audio Tracks

This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.
name: I Am Gooey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760
  • Storage: 51 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960
  • Storage: 51 MB available space

short_description: I Am Gooey is a top-down 2D atmospheric puzzle game where you must use your flame to light your way. As you ascend a certain ancient tower, time will pass, but you must reach the top by daybreak to fulfill your life's goal... To become the sun, so the world's daily cycle can continue!
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian
